response.author: Skylar Blue
response.quote: "Username or password is incorrect" well...at least tell me which...."

response.author: Gary Lutz
response.quote: "A calendar was hung in the kitchen as if to say: Expect more of the same."

response.author: Rachel Caine
response.title: Bitter Blood
response.quote: "You are just landmark stupid, aren't you? Has Guinness called yet about that world record?"

response.author: Maya Angelou
response.quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.

response.author: Walt Disney
response.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

response.author: Steve Jobs
response.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
